title: T. Keith Marks Scholarship Fund
description: To provide student support in the Department of Geological Sciences at CU Boulder.  Support includes scholarships, mentorships, research funds, research-related travel including presentations and fieldwork and other research-related costs.
marketingContent: To provide student support in the Department of Geological Sciences at CU Boulder.  Support includes scholarships, mentorships, research funds, research-related travel including presentations and fieldwork and other research-related costs.
